extension.valueString: ExposureGroup: JAMA 2018 Norwegian cohort study Surgery cohort

description: Cohort study with baseline data of exposures from November 2005 through July 2010 and follow-up data from 2006 until death or through December 2015 at a tertiary care outpatient center, Vestfold Hospital Trust, Norway. Consecutive treatment-seeking adult patients (n = 2109) with severe obesity assessed (221 patients excluded and 1888 patients included). -- Surgery Cohort received Bariatric surgery

extension.valueMarkdown: inclusion in  JAMA 2018 Norwegian cohort study

valueReference.display: ExposureDefinition: Bariatric Surgery (RYGB, VSG, LAGB, BPD)
